description: I'm having trouble with useState in my React component. The state updates but the component doesn't re-render. I've tried using useEffect but it still doesn't work. Need help debugging this issue.

subject: SQL
description: My SQL query using INNER JOIN is returning duplicate rows. I think it's related to the relationship between my tables but I'm not sure how to fix it. Need help understanding JOIN relationships better.

responses.message: Hi! I can help with this. The duplicate rows are likely because your JOIN is creating a Cartesian product. Try using DISTINCT or reviewing your JOIN conditions. I'm available for a session to walk through it if you'd like!

subject: Data Structures
description: Need help implementing a balanced binary search tree in Python. Specifically struggling with the rotation logic for AVL trees. Would appreciate if someone could explain the concept and help with the code.

responses.message: I can help with this! I recently worked on AVL trees. The rotation logic can be tricky but I'll walk you through it step by step. Let me know when you're free!

subject: JavaScript
description: How do I properly handle errors in async/await functions? My try-catch blocks aren't catching errors from nested async functions. Getting a lot of unhandled promise rejections.

responses.message: This is a common issue! You need to make sure all your promises are properly awaited. I can show you some patterns for error handling. Available today after 3pm!
I've dealt with this before! Happy to help. The key is to understand promise chains and error propagation. Let me know if you still need help!

subject: Node.js
description: My Express middleware isn't executing in the right order. Some routes work fine but others skip the authentication middleware. Not sure if it's a problem with how I'm defining routes or middleware placement.

subject: CSS
description: Trying to create a responsive navbar using flexbox but the items aren't aligning properly. I've tried different justify-content values but nothing seems to work. The layout breaks on mobile too.

responses.message: I can help! Flexbox can be tricky. Usually it's either missing flex-wrap or incorrect flex-direction. I'm free this afternoon if you want to go over it together!

subject: React
topic: Context API vs Redux - When to Use Which?
description: I'm building a medium-sized app and trying to decide between Context API and Redux for state management. What are the pros and cons of each? When should I use one over the other?

responses.message: Great question! Context API is simpler for small to medium apps, Redux is better for complex state with lots of updates. I recently migrated a project from Context to Redux and can share my experience!
